name: Ruins (BLeach)
description:
You are the last survivor in the ruins of an ancient civilization. Enemies appear out of nowhere and you need to fight them off in order to survive. It seems like all is lost but in the darkest darks there exists a little bit of light. You can occasional find these friendly creatures and sacrifice them in order to evolve your own abilities.

WASD - to move

SPACEBAR - to jump

SHIFT - to dash (can go through walls)

LEFTMOUSE - to attack your enemies

X - to sacrifice your friends

-Updates-

I fixed the player position to update with Time.deltatime
